feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
